title: Top Border Official Says He Was Asked to Resign
description: The Customs and Border Protection commissioner, Chris Magnus, has refused to step down, exposing conflicts at the Homeland Security Department over how to manage a high number of illegal border crossings.
media:credit: Al Drago for The New York Times
media:description: Chris Magnus oversees much of the customs and trade policy, as well as the countryâ€™s borders.
